1.17.0:
- **更换公共库 CDN 为[南科大镜像](https://mirrors.sustech.edu.cn/help/cdnjs.html)，原因见 [issue](https://github.com/beijixiaohu/OJBetter/issues/151)**



- 修复 submissions 页面代码"展开/折叠"按钮无效的问题



- 调整设置页面的布局结构
1.16.1: - Fix a problem with website localization errors
1.16.0:
- Add "ChatGPT Translation Prompt Customization" and "As System Prompt" options Thanks to **@Dawn-Xu-helloworld** for their collaboration

- Add code commit confirmation popup to show topic name,

- Add auto-translate option

- Add Sample by auto-commit option (off by default)

- Replace "Youdao Translator" interface

- Fix `` symbols in block beautification - Fix issue with `` symbols in block beautification **@cscnk52** contribution - Fix issue with interline LaTeX not correctly applying theme to the Monaco editor when theme is set to follow ` symbol in code block beautification

- Fix Monaco editor not applying theme correctly when theme is set to follow Thanks to **@cscnk52** for the contribution

- Fix LaTeX not replacing between lines correctly, fix performance issue with related regulars

- Fix "wrap old results" error when retranslating

- Fix not filtering script tags when converting MarkDown script tags

- Fixed some contests not jumping to Logu

- Changed clist rating colors to AtCoder's color rules

- Used polyfill for compatibility with browsers that don't support dialog.showModal() method (e.g. Firefox79)
